wikipedia_page.main: Lucy Tammam is a British fashion designer working with haute couture techniques and Fair trade practices. Tammam is the first British designer to have launched an ethical ready to wear bridal collection.

response: * Eco-couture designer Lucy Tammam uses eri silk (ahimsa/peace silk) and organic cotton to create her eco friendly couture evening and bridal wear collections.
Vegan designer Lucy Tammam uses eri silk in her couture evening and bridal wear collections.
